name: Rafail Gem
description: @{attribute}{Relic} equipment associated with the @{ability}{Major Crest of Lamine||Minor Crest of Lamine}{Crest of Lamine} and the abilities @{ability}{Aegis} and @{ability}{Pavise}. Grants immunity to critical hits, and nullifies Effectiveness against Armor, Cavalry, and Flying units against the wielder.
comment: Items in modifers can either be integers or string expressions
